summary.para: TheRemSNB structure is used for marshaling theSNB data type.

member.name: RemSNB.ulCntStr
member.summary: Number of strings in the rgString buffer.

member.name: RemSNB.ulCntChar
member.summary: Size in bytes of the rgString buffer.

member.name: RemSNB.rgString
member.summary: Pointer to an array of bytes containing the stream name strings from the SNB structure.
